name: Shep Hard
description:
Keep your flock safe in this extreme shepherding game. Your goal is to raise 10 platinum sheep. You'll need to grow your plot, smack away wolves, shear your sheep, and eventually lay down mortar towers and turrets to get it done in this insane blend of Tower Defense and King of the Hill.

Made in 48 hours for the IndieSpeedRun in October 2013
